name: Frontier (itch) (Hedgehog125)
description:
A space shooter type game. Kinda based off of: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/58976080/ (or inspired or something)

Source code is here: https://github.com/hedgehog125/Frontier-Fan-Made-Game

Instructions

Erm, shoot the spaceships and don't crash into them. That's about it.

You fire automatically, just use the mouse or your finger to control the spaceship.

Enjoy :)
